predicate.note: Frames file for 'field' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to answer successfully or put into action

example.name: passive
example.text: Then , in 1988 , a proposal [*] to keep better track of income by [*] selling prepaid cards for pachinko was fielded [*-1] in parliament .
example.arg: [*-1] -> a proposal [*] to keep better track of income by [*] selling prepaid cards for pachinko

example.name: transitive
example.text: He puts in busy six-day weeks ( excluding game days ) , and on one recent afternoon fielded questions [*ICH*-1] , in the course of an hour , from a TV producer , his luxury-suite marketing manager , a disgruntled customer and a roomful of Arkansas reporters .
example.arg: [ questions [*ICH*-1]] [ from a TV producer , his luxury-suite marketing manager , a disgruntled customer and a roomful of Arkansas reporters]
in the course of an hour
